A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was way better than The Force Awakens in my books. The only downfall of this movie was the 20 minutes or so of plot that didn’t need to be in the movie. And if you are trying to figure that plot out\, it’s the scenes in the movie that kind of reverted back to the prequel era (casino planet). The rest of the movie though was solid. I’d put this #3 on the list behind A New Hope and Empire Strikes Back.
